pkgmetadata.longdescription:
The dynamic LDAP back-end is a plug-in for BIND that provides an LDAP database back-end capabilities. It requires dyndb interface which is present in BIND versions >= 9.11.0rc1.
Features support for dynamic updates SASL authentication SyncRepl (RFC 4533) for run-time synchronization with LDAP server read-query performance nearly same as with plain BIND AXFR and IXFR zone transfers are supported DNSSEC in-line signing is supported, including dynamic updates
